name: Your Pure Truth

Info
Pass on your truth to the Truth Agent. Pureness of your truth is represented by the clarity the melody you are listening. There are invisible (but AUDIBLE) areas where your truth is being corrupted. Avoid them and share the truth as pure as possible. Listen carefully.

Controls
